test-case.name: op-base64Binary-equal2args-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-base64Binary-equal2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Mar 22 11:23:46 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:base64Binary-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:base64Binary(lower bound) $value2 = xs:base64Binary(lower bound) *******************************************************

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-1
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-1 Description: Simple base 64 binary operation as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "eq" operators.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-2
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-2 Description: Simple base 64 Binary operation as part of a logical expression. Use "or" and "eq" operators.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-3
test-case.description: Test: base54BinaryEqual-3 Description: Simple base 64 binary operation as part of argument to fn:not function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-4
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-4 Description: Simple operation with xs:base64binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "eq" operators with "fn:true" function.

test-case.name: base64binaryequal-5
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-5 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "eq" operators with "fn:false" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-6
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-6 Description: Simple operation using xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "or" and "eq" operators and "fn:true" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-7
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-7 Description: Simple operation using xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "or" and "eq" operators and "fn:false" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-8
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-8 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "ne" operators.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-9
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-9 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "ne" operators.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-10
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-10 Description: Simple opeartion involving xs:base64Binary values as part of argument to "fn:not" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-11
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-11 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "ne" operators with "fn:true" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-12
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-12 Description: Simple operation involving base64Binary values as part of a logical expression. Use "and" and "ne" operators with "fn:false" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-13
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-13 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values used as part of a logical expression. Use "or" and "ne" operators and "fn:true" function.

test-case.name: base64BinaryEqual-14
test-case.description: Test: base64BinaryEqual-14 Description: Simple operation involving xs:base64Binary values used as part of a logical expression. Use "or" and "ne" operators and "fn:false" function.

test-case.name: K-Base64BinaryEQ-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-Base64BinaryEQ-1 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: A test whose essence is: `xs:base64Binary(xs:hexBinary("03")) eq xs:base64Binary(xs:hexBinary("03"))`. *******************************************************

test-case.name: K-Base64BinaryEQ-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-Base64BinaryEQ-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: A test whose essence is: `xs:base64Binary(xs:hexBinary("03")) ne xs:base64Binary(xs:hexBinary("13"))`. *******************************************************
